trans-unit.source: Exposes a method that compares two objects.
trans-unit.target: 公開比較兩個物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: This interface is used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Array.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面用於搭配<xref:System.Array.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Array.BinarySearch%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: It provides a way to customize the sort order of a collection.
trans-unit.target: 它提供一個方法來自訂集合的排序次序。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer.Compare%2A> method for notes on parameters and return value.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Collections.IComparer.Compare%2A>附註的參數和傳回值的方法。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this interface is the <xref:System.Collections.Comparer> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面的預設實作是<xref:System.Collections.Comparer>類別。

trans-unit.source: For the generic version of this interface, see <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面的泛型版本，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IComparer%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface to sort an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>介面，以排序<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>物件。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface is implemented using the <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer> class to reverse the order of the contents of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>使用實作介面<xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>類別的內容的順序互換<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個物件。

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個物件。

trans-unit.source: Compares two objects and returns a value indicating whether one is less than, equal to, or greater than the other.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個物件並傳回值，指出其中一個物件為小於、等於或大於另一個物件。

trans-unit.source: A signed integer that indicates the relative values of <paramref name="x" /> and <paramref name="y" />, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 帶正負號的整數，表示 <paramref name="x" /> 和 <paramref name="y" /> 的相對值，如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 值

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Meaning
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 意義

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term> Less than zero
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term>小於零

trans-unit.source: </term><description><paramref name="x" /> is less than <paramref name="y" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description><paramref name="x" /> 小於 <paramref name="y" />。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> Zero
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 零

trans-unit.source: </term><description><paramref name="x" /> equals <paramref name="y" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description><paramref name="x" /> 等於 <paramref name="y" />。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> Greater than zero
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 大於零

trans-unit.source: </term><description><paramref name="x" /> is greater than <paramref name="y" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description><paramref name="x" /> 大於 <paramref name="y" />。

trans-unit.source: The preferred implementation is to use the <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> method of one of the parameters.
trans-unit.target: 比較好的實作是使用<xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A>方法的其中一個參數。

trans-unit.source: Comparing `null` with any type is allowed and does not generate an exception when using <xref:System.IComparable>.
trans-unit.target: 比較`null`允許與任何類型，且不會產生例外狀況，當使用<xref:System.IComparable>。

trans-unit.source: When sorting, `null` is considered to be less than any other object.
trans-unit.target: 排序時，`null`會被視為小於任何其他物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface to sort an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>介面，以排序<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>物件。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface is implemented using the <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer> class to reverse the order of the contents of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>使用實作介面<xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>類別的內容的順序互換<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: Neither <paramref name="x" /> nor <paramref name="y" /> implements the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="x" /> 和 <paramref name="y" /> 都不實作 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="x" /> and <paramref name="y" /> are of different types and neither one can handle comparisons with the other.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="x" /> 和 <paramref name="y" /> 是不同的型別，而且二者都不能處理與另外一方的比較。
